resources.string: Hey, I download an amazing apps, Text Repeater. This app generate repeated message for you, generate blank message and allows to join text before and after. \nDownload it from Google Play Store ->

How to use Join Text Before/After?

If you would like to add/join multiple text before or after at once time then have to separate the text with comme (,) or line.
 For example, if you want to separate with comma (,) then enter text like: Apple,Pineapple,Mango
 If you want to separate with line then enter text like:
 Apple
 Pineapple
 Mango

Remember you can only add/join text up to 100 lines in order to running this app smoothly in your device. If you need more text to add/join, follow the process few times.

Enter the text you want repeat. Enter how many times you want to repeat your text. 
If you select with space, it will put space between two repeated texts. For example: Your Text Your Text Your Text Your Text.
 
Without space your text will be look like: 
Your TextYour TextYourText Your Text.

If you select new line, it will be generate every text with new line for example:
 
Your Text 
Your Text 
Your Text 
Your Text 

If you select Vertical space, it will generate vertical space between two repeated texts. For example:


Your Text


Your Text


Your Text


Your Text

Enter how many times you want to generate blank text. You can add lines in your blank text. \nRemember that few application such as Facebook messenger or might be other applications, doesn\'t allow to enter blank text. In this case, this will be not our application fault.
Note: Blank texts cannot be send to few applications because they trim all the blank text before send to the recipient. In this case, this, will be not our application fault.
